name: Recognition Loop
description:
Recognition Loop is a Sokoban inspired puzzle game, made for the eighth Black and White Jam.

A history bar on the lower half of the screen records the players adjacent tiles during every step you go. You are set back to the moment, a specific pattern was recorded as soon as it appears a second time.
The goal of each level is to avoid resulting loops and to reach the flag.

The game contains 6 different levels (joined late and didn't have time to make more qwq)

I hope you'll have a lot of fun!
